episode.title: United States v. One Assortment of 89 Firearms

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I also have the judgment and opinion of the Court to announce in United States against One Assortment of 89 Firearms.

And for reason stated in the opinion of the Court also filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit is reverse and the case is remanded for further proceedings consistent with the Court's opinion.
